Function Documentation

PIZQueue* pizQueueNew ( void   ) 

Create the queue.

In case of failure the pointer is NULL.

Returns:
A pointer to the new queue.

void pizQueueFree ( PIZQueue *  x  ) 

Free the queue.

It is safe to pass NULL pointer.

Parameters:
x A Pointer.

void pizQueueClear ( PIZQueue *  x  ) 

Clear the queue.

Parameters:
x A valid pointer.

PIZError pizQueueAppend ( PIZQueue *  x,
long  value 
)

Enqueue a value.

Parameters:
x A valid pointer.
value The value to append.
Returns:
An error code.

PIZError pizQueuePop ( PIZQueue *  x  ) 

Dequeue a value.

To get the dequeued value use pizQueuePoppedValue(). Return PIZ_ERROR if the queue is empty.

Parameters:
x A valid pointer.
Returns:
An error code.

PIZError pizQueuePopLastValue ( PIZQueue *  x  ) 

Dequeue last value (stack way).

To get the dequeued value use pizQueuePoppedValue(). Return PIZ_ERROR if the queue is empty.

Parameters:
x A valid pointer.
Returns:
An error code.

long pizQueueCount ( const PIZQueue *  x  ) 

Get the number of values in the queue.

Parameters:
x A valid pointer.
Returns:
The number of values.

long pizQueuePoppedValue ( const PIZQueue *  x  ) 

Get the dequeued value.

Remarks:
This value is initialized with -1.
Parameters:
x A valid pointer.
Returns:
The value.
